prompt: Customer says they were billed twice for the same invoice.
response: Thank you for reporting this. I checked your account and can confirm duplicate billing on invoice INV-2044. We have issued a reversal for the duplicate charge. You will see the correction within 3-5 business days. Please reply if you want a PDF credit memo.

prompt: User asks for refund after 35 days. Standard policy is 30 days, no exceptions unless technical failure on our side.
response: Thanks for your request. Our standard refund window is 30 days from purchase, so this request is outside policy. If you experienced a technical service failure, share the incident time and error details and we can review an exception.

prompt: Customer cannot log in with SSO after password reset.
response: I understand the urgency. Please confirm whether the SSO provider password was reset or only the app password. Then try signing out of all sessions, wait 5 minutes for token expiry, and retry in a private browser window. If it persists, share the exact timestamp and error code.

prompt: Need to escalate timeout issue to Tier-2.
response: Escalation Summary: Intermittent API timeouts on /reports endpoint. Repro: 1) Login as standard analyst user, 2) Open Reports, 3) Run monthly usage report, 4) Observe timeout after 20-30 seconds. Started around 09:15 UTC. Impact: report generation blocked for multiple users.

prompt: Write a concise internal policy answer about data export requests.
response: Per policy, data export requests require verified admin approval and are fulfilled within 5 business days. Include tenant ID, date range, and compliance reason in the request form.
